story_txt:
Our Story "What ever we do, we do it for the kids!"

Our primary focus has been advocacy for the educational rights of disabled students in public schools, the education of parents and educators on the various aspects of each disability and requirements of educational law. Many years ago we just provided services for children with ADHD, now we do ALL disabilities, disorders and syndromes that affect the learning of the child or the teen. Find out more at our web site http://www.adhdservices.org/ where you can also download forms, checklists and resources that will assist you in your own advocacy efforts. You can also hear our CEO speaking weekly on special education topics on the Rose Moore Show at www.alltalkradio.net (The Rose Moore Show).


The Impact
We are currently focusing on one individual: Hannah Lowry.
Hannah Lowry is a 13 year old girl living in
Las Vegas, Nevada.  She was first diagnosed with severe aplastic
anemia in April 2008 when she was 9 years old.  Aplastic anemia is a
rare disorder in which a person’s bone marrow fails, resulting in critically
low levels of red blood cells, white blood cells, and platelets.  After
her initial diagnosis, Hannah was treated with immunosuppressant therapy for
approximately one year and seemed to have overcome the disorder.  After
nearly 2 years of normal blood levels, her condition returned in early
2011.  Her doctors have decided that her best option for treatment is
a bone marrow transplant.
When Hannah was diagnosed in 2008, all
immediate family members were tested to find a bone marrow donor, but none
matched.  The recommended treatment for aplastic anemia when there are no related-donor matches for
transplant is to undergo immunosuppressant therapy.  Hannah responded quickly to the drug therapy
and was able to produce enough blood cells on her own without requiring
transfusions after about one month of treatment.  She continued to improve over the next year,
eventually returning to normal blood levels on her own without the help of
drugs.  
For nearly 2 years after
stopping the immunosuppressant therapy, Hannah was able to enjoy the normal
life of a child.  She was able to attend
school with her peers, participate in all activities and resume her gymnastics and
tumbling classes.  Since her re-diagnosis
in 2011, her life has changed drastically. 
Due to her increased risk for bleeding and her suppressed immune system,
Hannah has had to restrict or stop virtually all activities and remain at home since
April 2011.
Early in 2011, during a
routine blood check, it was discovered that her blood levels were dropping
below normal levels again.  After several
weeks of monitoring her blood levels, a bone marrow biopsy and aspiration were
performed to confirm what was already expected: 
the aplastic anemia had returned. 
Since Hannah has already gone through the immunosuppressant therapy and
has had a recurrence of the disorder, it was recommended that a search be
conducted to find an unrelated bone marrow donor.  Since Nevada does not have a facility that performs
the type of transplant she needs, Hannah was referred to the transplant team at
Loma Linda University Medical Center in California.  Once a donor has been identified, Hannah will
undergo chemotherapy and radiation to prepare her for the bone marrow
transplant.  Since her own immune system
will be completely destroyed, it is expected that she will be confined to the
Pediatric Intensive Care Unit for at least 2 months following transplant while
her new immune system is given time to develop. 
After being released from the hospital, Hannah will need to remain in
California for at least another 2 months in order to be near the transplant
center for monitoring several times per week. 
Once Hannah has recovered enough to be monitored by her doctor in Nevada,
she will be allowed to return home to finish recovering.  Throughout the entire recovery process, great
measures must be taken to ensure that she is not exposed to anything that could
make her sick.  Her activities and
environment will be heavily restricted and monitored for at least a year while
her new immune system develops and becomes strong enough to protect her.  
As of June 1, 2011,
Hannah is currently waiting for an unrelated donor match to be confirmed.  It is expected that the transplant process
will begin in late June or early July, 2011. 
In the meantime, Hannah is hospitalized to receive red blood cell and
platelet transfusions about once per week when her levels drop too low.  She has been unable to physically attend
school since April; however, she has been able to attend some of her classes
via video conferencing.  Her goal is to
be well enough by the fall of 2012 to begin high school with her peers.  

Tracking her Progress:     












You can hear about her progress and fundraising events though www.alltalkradio.net, www.adhdcas.org and through facebook at http://www.facebook.com/pages/ADHD-Child-Advocate-Services/188850371167749?sk=wall


Where The Profits Go

Everyone asks, "Where does the money go?". Understandably so, not a lot of people believe that 100% of the profits goes to the targeted reason, as most (not all) don't give you the break down. Well, this Non-profit company is well known in Nevada for never hoarding a penny of any donation given. So, with no regret or hidden agenda, here is the break down of where your money goes.


Donations made directly to this site:


This website states if we make our goal, it takes 10% of the total profits. My guess is to cover CC processing charges, transfer in back account, advertising, etc etc. Once it hits the ADHD CAS bank account, it is not touched until either 1) the deadlines of July 4th / July 30th OR 2) the goals are met. From there, 100% of the funds goes directly to Hannah's parents to pay for her treatments, medication, housing, transportation, sanitation and sterilization of any place she stays, education, etc. 


Donations coming from the TNT fireworks booth:

TNT was kind enough to provide us with a location, booth, and fireworks at a discounted rate. But there are fees that apply. We purchase the fireworks at 50% and sell them for 100% of its value. Whatever we don't sell we may return to TNT at our purchased price. There are a few items we must rent, and this is where donations of items comes in. Ie.  Renting a trailer to store our fireworks (Required by Fire and Safety laws) will cost about $200. The company it's currently on hold w is willing to give a discount, but hasn't given an estimate until upon return. If I can get someone to let us borrow an enclosed trailer based out of Las Vegas, that expense will go to Hannah Lowry rather than the rental cost. After all is said and done, and those expenses are paid out, 100% of the remaining funds will go to her. 

To view the list of items needed for the TNT fireworks booth please visit (we will update the list as items get donated):
http://www.facebook.com/note.php?note_id=188886017830851

If we don't get these items donated, we will have to take some of the profits from the event and pay the cost. Like all of you, we would rather have these items donated so more money goes to Hannah's treatments. 
 
We do want to make it clear that ADHD CAS will not take a cut of the profits from any event of donation directed to a specific client - being Hannah Lowry. If you would like to donate to ADHD CAS directly, please donate through paypal at https://www.paypal.com/us/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_flow&SESSION=SsY-Be2rdvuFMu09obPla2gborTLoSKl5zqiG5sSkpHGFSlB0IRmv6CLPfG&dispatch=5885d80a13c0db1f8e263663d3faee8d422be6d275c375afb284863ba74d6cdc
or mailing monies to our home office at 7516 Powder River Court. Las Vegas, NV 89131 and NOT through the Hannah Lowry fundraising website or events. Thank you.

story:
THE BIG STORY

Alexzander Greer is a 12 year old from Detroit who loves adventure! He attends Old Redford Academy Middle School where is he is a 4.0 student. He says that being a high achieving student is challenging, but with the help of his mom and grandmother he overcomes the obstacles. While maintaining his 4.0 GPA, Alexzander is also a member of his schools debate and academic games teams and also Boys to Men, a mentoring and life coaching program. Among his favorite actives is working with the peer mediation program and ensuring that his peers find safe and responsible ways to handle their problems in school.

Alexzander has been asked to travel to China with The People to People Student Ambassador Program in June of 2014. He feels this is an honor and really shows that hard work is its own reward.

The total cost of the trip is $7,000. Alexzander's mother and grandmother have been working very hard doing fundraisers and outreach to ensure that he has the needed funds to make this trip. They still need to raise $5,000 to reach their goal.

When we met Alexzander at a dinner where he was being given a youth leadership award and heard about this opportunity for him to travel we reached out to his mother to see what was needed. It was then we decided to create this page, a way to reach out to our friends and family to help this young man.

We know that you don't know him personally, but the opportunity to expose such a gifted and motivated young person to 17 days of international travel can't be understated. Your gift will help Alexzander discover new lands, new people and new ways of doing great things. He will bring that knowledge back with him to Detroit and continue to impact his peers and community and terrific ways.

THE DETAILS

  • We are looking to raise $5K. The program is priced at $7K and that will take care of all of Alexzander's travel expenses (flight, hotel, transportation, program materials, etc.). Any additional money raised will help with the additional expenses of traveling (clothing, luggage, spending money etc.)
  • Once the campaign has wrapped we will send everyone who donated a follow up email with the final outcomes and a special note from Alexzander.


EVERYONE CAN HELP

We understand everyone can't contribute, but everyone can help:

  • Please help share the word about this campaign with your friends and networks.
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools to make reaching your friends even easier.

Thank you for your time and donation!

story:
PLEASE BE SURE TO CHECK OUT THE PERKS AND CONTEST BELOW. ONLY A FEW DAYS LEFT TO GET IN ON THIS TREMENDOUS OPPORTUNITY!

TELL ALL YOUR FAMILY, FRIENDS, AND ASSOCIATES ABOUT THIS CAMPAIGN.  THANK YOU.

CAMPAIGN OVERVIEW

Many film projects need funding. Many good business projects need funding. The need for charitable funds is increasing yet charitable donations have decreased. People need a simple easy way to de-stress and improve their station in life in all areas. This project and campaign provide powerful solutions to help address these concerns.

This project is now simply the initial capitalization for new Non-Profit that will receive substantial monies from (Each Film) for humanitarian and philanthropic programs such as small business grants, Food banks,  scholarships, youth development, entrepreneurial, health education, the Arts, and financial education programs. 

This project will substantially improve the lives of many people from all walks of life worldwide and UPLIFT humanity. For this reason we have launched this campaign, appropriately titled, "World Transformation". 

I invite you to join me in this momentous campaign by making a contribution, which can improve your life and make the world a better place for all of us.

About the founders: Christopher Williams is 52 years old and currently resides in Atlanta, Georgia. His firm specializes in creative business financing solutions.  For this project, he has teamed up with two Powerhouses.  One a long time friend and business associate of more than 20 years.  He is an actual project funder on a major scale and has been on the leading edge of large scale Project Finance for over 30 years.  He has funded major business projects of all types all over the world, including many independent films.  The other a Top Hollywood Producer, Jonathan Krane featured in the video for this campaign.  As you can see from the video he has been very successful with several blockbuster hit movies to his credit.  He is known as a Maverick in the film industry.  All of his films are feature films released in theaters worldwide starring "A" list talent.  All of his films have been profitable. 

It is projected each film will generate a minimum of $2 million to the nonprofit Foundation for charity x 20 films = $40 million to charity 

************************************************************************

WHAT WE NEED

We actually don't need anything. For those who have followed this campaign from the beginning we were needing to use contribution monies to effect a second $25+ mm fundraising. This is no longer the case. When we kicked off this campaign contributions were slow in coming so we went to the institutional funders. We have now arranged the $25 mm. In fact, we have arranged substantially more than this from the institutional finance sector. What we are now offering here in this campaign is simply opportunity. The opportunity to be a part of something great by benefiting from the Perks and contest prizes offered in this campaign. This is a Verified Non-Profit Fundraising so your campaign contributions are TAX DEDUCTIBLE.  

Due to the fact that we had to go the route of Institutional Finance to procure the 10% Equity piece the Non Profit will no longer get the 10% of profits it originally was to get from the films. This is no longer a Non Profit/For Profit Collaboration. They are now separate. However the Non Profit Foundation will still receive what would have normally been paid as capital gains tax by the Principals from the films profits as Donations to the Foundation. This will amount to a minimum of $2 mm per film.

Over time we have a plan to capitalize the Non Profit foundation to the tune of $500+ mm. This way the great humanitarian and philanthropic work to be done by the foundation will still get done.

We, in partnership with Producer, Jonathan D. Krane, are producing 40+ feature films. The financing is 100% arranged. Each film will feature "A" list talent, have a substantial P & A (Print and Advertising) budget and be distributed in theaters, on DVD, and on Cable world wide.  Each film to give a free dedication, which is basically an advertisement, to a non-profit charity at the end of the film credits, giving this charity and their cause substantial mainstream international exposure.  This will help them in their fund raising efforts and bring more awareness to their cause to assist them in effecting their mission. 

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

WHAT YOU GET

As a Special Thank you to show our appreciation we have some very special Perks for you.

(BE SURE TO CHECKOUT THE REFERRAL CONTEST !!!  EACH WEEK OR SO AS THE CAMPAIGN PROGRESSES WE WILL ADD ADDITIONAL PRIZES TO THE CONTEST.

Contest Prizes Phase # 1 - Acting Roles or Film Premier Passes Contest.

(Added May 19, 2014 - We will have a feature film produced in the two states in the U.S. and the two countries outside the U.S. which have the most campaign dollars contributed to the campaign. This will bring jobs, economic stimulus, and positive international exposure to these four venue locations) 

(Added June 29, 2014 - The Top 20 Persons that bring contribution dollars to this campaign via their referral down line as tracked by Indiegogo will receive an all expenses paid FREE 5 Day Caribbean Cruise to Jamaica and the Grand Cayman Island in a Balcony Suite on either Royal Caribbean Cruise Lines or Carnival Cruise Lines. This is based on referral contribution dollars not personal contributions)

(Added June 20, 2014 Anyone whose referral down line contributions  - not personal contributions- total $25,000 or $250,000 will get the same Perk benefits as if they had personally contributed that amount, i.e. Membership as Elite or Master Contributor Membership and all the benefits that entails)

In this referral contest we are offering contestants the opportunity to win either an acting part in one of the feature films or a Pass for them and one guest of their choosing to attend an actual Red Carpet Film Premier with the film Stars. 

Here is how this works:  

Your chances of winning increases the more you refer others to donate to this campaign.

The top fifteen (15) referral based fundraisers will each receive a Thank you letter from Hollywood Producer, Jonathan D. Krane, personally addressed to them. 

Each of the top fifteen (15)  winners will also receive their choice of EITHER a GUARANTEED non speaking walk on part in one of the feature films in a scene with one of the "A" list film stars, plus a screen test directly with the film Producer and/or Director.  If they do well on the screen test they will be offered a larger acting part in the film OR if they don't want the acting part they can choose to receive two (2) Passes to the actual Red Carpet Film Premier with the film Stars (***Paid airfare and hotel expenses to film production set or film premier location included).

Please note:

* This contest is based on referral down line based contributions only. 

* In order for your referrals to be tracked by the Indiegogo referral tracking software you must be EITHER a contributor to this campaign OR have an Indiegogo account. This is very important.  If you are not a contributor to the campaign AND do not have an Indiegogo account your referrals will not be tracked and therefore cannot be tallied and used for this referral contest.  (See; "How to Share a Campaign" and "How to Run a Referral Contest" in the Indiegogo website for more details).

* Your referrals contribution amount will be tallied SOLELY from your referrals down line as tracked from the Indiegogo sight referral tracker.  For those of you that choose to be contributors, when you contribute to this “World Transformation” campaign on any level the site will ask if you would like to share the campaign.  Click “Yes”.  You will be assigned your own personal link.  Your referrals contribution total will be calculated SOLELY from referrals contributions using your personally assigned link. Any other referrals method will not be counted.  So be sure you are using your personally assigned Indiegogo link to get your credits.  The Indiegogo referral tracker will not only track your direct referrals. It will track also your referrals referrals, and their referrals like a MLM (Multi Level Marketing) down line tracker.  You get credit for your entire referral down line contributions through infinite levels.

For example:  You either have an Indiegogo account or you contribute to the campaign on any level, get your personal link, and share the campaign with others, making sure you are using your personal Indiegogo assigned link.  Lets say of all your referrals 20 persons contribute.  Those 20 people decide to join the contest, get their personal link, share the campaign, and those 20 people referring each bring in 20 contributors.  Then those 400 contributors each bring in 20 contributors.  Then those 8,000 contributors each bring in 20 contributors, and so on, down through infinity.  The total dollar amount contributed by this entire referral down line network is credited to you and you are ranked among all referring contributors by the TOTAL DOLLAR AMOUNT of your entire referral down line. 

The top 15 referrers as ranked by their referral down line TOTAL CONTRIBUTIONS DOLLAR AMOUNT to this campaign win.

************************************************************************

ALL CONTRIBUTIONS ARE 100% TAX DEDUCTIBLE!!!

We know times are tough for many and we really do want to see everyone have the opportunity to directly benefit from this campaign. 

So for each $25 contribution we will send the contributor a specially designed "Wheel of Abundance".  This is a very powerful de-stressing visual tool believed by many to also create abundance in the areas of money, health, success, relationships, and happiness in one's life. 

For each $100 contribution you will get a Beautiful Full Color Glossy 24" x 36" Decorative Poster. You will also receive the "Wheel of Abundance". Plus as a $100 contributor you will also be put in a MOVIE FAN CLUB MEMBERS DATABASE.  From this database we will choose and offer Acting Parts in the films, Passes to the production set during filming, Film Premier Tickets, and Movie Memorabilia items personally autographed by the "film stars themselves".

The Producer has agreed to give several acting opportunities per film to up and coming acting talent in each film x 20 films. When the producer starts to cast roles for the films, we will be requesting information and photos from contributors interested in the various opportunities described below which we will give to contributors.  All of the films will be rated PG or PG-13 and will be positive life affirming stories. 

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

YES, THERE IS MORE!!!

All contributors to this campaign, regardless of contribution level, will be listed in the Directory of Founding Members of this Non Profit Foundation. 

$1,500 contributors receive a Hollywood Poster, the "Wheel of Abundance", all the benefits of the MOVIE FAN CLUB MEMBERS DATABASE, plus you will be put in a SPECIAL CONTRIBUTORS MEMBERS DATABASE.  Each film requires production contractors and vendors, (i.e. food catering, transportation, make-up artist, set design, photographers, etc...).  For each film, we will first choose from this SPECIAL CONTRIBUTORS MEMBERS DATABASE for qualified, competitive, competent contractors for these positions.

Note: The difference between Fan Club Membership and Special Contributors Membership is that Fan Club Membership is for individuals wanting acting parts, music in the film soundtrack, etc. in the films. The Special Contributors Membership is for qualified businesses that wish to be contractors and vendors to the film project such as catering the meals for the cast and crew.

$25,000 contributors will get all the previous perks, plus entry into an ELITE CONTRIBUTORS MEMBERS DATABASE.  These elite contributors will have access to the billions in for profit and non-profit funding created in this project model for their own QUALIFIED projects. By contributing at the $25,000 ELITE CONTRIBUTORS LEVEL, that becomes your skin in the game and it is 100% tax deductible. It is not that our funders don't require skin in the game. They do. But, for CONTRIBUTORS AT THE $25,000 ELITE MEMBER (OR ABOVE) LEVEL, AS A FOUNDING FOUNDATION MEMBER THE FOUNDATION, ONCE CAPITALIZED, WILL COVER 100% OF THE SKIN IN THE GAME (FRONT END COSTS/EQUITY) REQUIRED OF THE CLIENT BY TH E FUNDER FOR LARGE SCALE ($10 MM+) BUSINESS PROJECTS APPROVED BY OUR SOURCES AS PART OF THE FOR PROFIT/NON PROFIT COLLABORATION. IF YOU REALLY GET WHAT I JUST STATED, YOU KNOW THAT IS HUGE!!!  

$250,000 contributors will get all the previous perks plus be put in our MASTER CONTRIBUTORS MEMBERS DATABASE.  Each MASTER CONTRIBUTOR will receive a VIP Invite for them and a guest to attend the Kick Off Party Gala Hollywood Gala at the Hollywood hills home of Producer, Jonathan D. Krane, You will be given the opportunity to receive (1) FREE product brand integration (not a mere product placement) in (1) of the feature films.  (Brand Product Integration must be structured satisfactory to the Producer and the Primary Film Funder). Corporations spend over $400 million dollars annually to buy these product brand integration spots in films and television.  This specific type of advertising in a feature film can easily cost millions of dollars. 

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

THE IMPACT

This project will effect the production and distribution of many good quality feature films, getting stories told and addressing social issues that might otherwise never receive film funding through more traditional funding.

As the Foundation funds grow this will enable the funding of non film projects getting great products and services into the marketplace. 

This project will create a considerable number of jobs and stimulate the economy worldwide.

This project will generate many millions of dollars for philanthropic and humanitarian causes.

This project will give international exposure to life affirming humanitarian and philanthropic endeavors. 

My specially designed, "Wheel of Abundance" provided to contributors to this campaign will enable them to positively transform their lives in many ways including, but not limited to, the areas of health, money, success, and relationships.  

The success of this campaign will allow us to give a special Thank you to Indiegogo for providing this fundraising platform by positioning our Non-Profit to contribute substantially to other Indiegogo campaigns.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP

Some people just can’t contribute, we fully understand but you can still help.  We are all connected and getting these projects successfully implemented makes the world a better place in a substantial way.  So I ask that you please do the following:

· Get the word out and MAKE SOME NOISE!

· Use the Indiegogo share tools to help spread the word about this campaign.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

DISCLAIMERS

(1) All contributions to this campaign are non refundable.

(2) Some of the contest awards and Perks in this Campaign will ONLY be provided, such as acting parts, film premier passes, etc.. upon the films being successfully produced.  

(3) The Wheel of Abundance provided as a Perk in this campaign is being provided as a curious item and for it's legendary purposes only. No supernatural, magical, medical, or therapeutic claims are made for the Wheel of Abundance.

(4) All material facts regarding this campaign, and the contest included in this campaign, are included in this Indiegogo campaign presentation material.  This Indiegogo campaign presentation material is the ONLY authorized and accurate information to be relied upon in your decisions to join the campaign and/or the campaign contest herein.  Any representations to the contrary are false, unauthorized, and are NOT to be relied upon.
story_txt: PLEASE BE SURE TO CHECK OUT THE PERKS AND CONTEST BELOW. ONLY A FEW DAYS LEFT TO GET IN ON THIS TREMENDOUS OPPORTUNITY!TELL ALL YOUR FAMILY, FRIENDS, AND ASSOCIATES ABOUT THIS CAMPAIGN.  THANK YOU.CAMPAIGN OVERVIEWMany film projects need funding. Many good business projects need funding. The need for charitable funds is increasing yet charitable donations have decreased. People need a simple easy way to de-stress and improve their station in life in all areas. This project and campaign provide powerful solutions to help address these concerns.This project is now simply the initial capitalization for new Non-Profit that will receive substantial monies from (Each Film) for humanitarian and philanthropic programs such as small business grants, Food banks,  scholarships, youth development, entrepreneurial, health education, the Arts, and financial education programs. This project will substantially improve the lives of many people from all walks of life worldwide and UPLIFT humanity. For this reason we have launched this campaign, appropriately titled, "World Transformation". I invite you to join me in this momentous campaign by making a contribution, which can improve your life and make the world a better place for all of us.About the founders: Christopher Williams is 52 years old and currently resides in Atlanta, Georgia. His firm specializes in creative business financing solutions.  For this project, he has teamed up with two Powerhouses.  One a long time friend and business associate of more than 20 years.  He is an actual project funder on a major scale and has been on the leading edge of large scale Project Finance for over 30 years.  He has funded major business projects of all types all over the world, including many independent films.  The other a Top Hollywood Producer, Jonathan Krane featured in the video for this campaign.  As you can see from the video he has been very successful with several blockbuster hit movies to his credit.  He is known as a Maverick in the film industry.  All of his films are feature films released in theaters worldwide starring "A" list talent.  All of his films have been profitable. It is projected each film will generate a minimum of $2 million to the nonprofit Foundation for charity x 20 films = $40 million to charity ************************************************************************WHAT WE NEEDWe actually don't need anything. For those who have followed this campaign from the beginning we were needing to use contribution monies to effect a second $25+ mm fundraising. This is no longer the case. When we kicked off this campaign contributions were slow in coming so we went to the institutional funders. We have now arranged the $25 mm. In fact, we have arranged substantially more than this from the institutional finance sector. What we are now offering here in this campaign is simply opportunity. The opportunity to be a part of something great by benefiting from the Perks and contest prizes offered in this campaign. This is a Verified Non-Profit Fundraising so your campaign contributions are TAX DEDUCTIBLE.  Due to the fact that we had to go the route of Institutional Finance to procure the 10% Equity piece the Non Profit will no longer get the 10% of profits it originally was to get from the films. This is no longer a Non Profit/For Profit Collaboration. They are now separate. However the Non Profit Foundation will still receive what would have normally been paid as capital gains tax by the Principals from the films profits as Donations to the Foundation. This will amount to a minimum of $2 mm per film.Over time we have a plan to capitalize the Non Profit foundation to the tune of $500+ mm. This way the great humanitarian and philanthropic work to be done by the foundation will still get done.We, in partnership with Producer, Jonathan D. Krane, are producing 40+ feature films. The financing is 100% arranged. Each film will feature "A" list talent, have a substantial P & A (Print and Advertising) budget and be distributed in theaters, on DVD, and on Cable world wide.  Each film to give a free dedication, which is basically an advertisement, to a non-profit charity at the end of the film credits, giving this charity and their cause substantial mainstream international exposure.  This will help them in their fund raising efforts and bring more awareness to their cause to assist them in effecting their mission. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~WHAT YOU GETAs a Special Thank you to show our appreciation we have some very special Perks for you.(BE SURE TO CHECKOUT THE REFERRAL CONTEST !!!  EACH WEEK OR SO AS THE CAMPAIGN PROGRESSES WE WILL ADD ADDITIONAL PRIZES TO THE CONTEST.Contest Prizes Phase # 1 - Acting Roles or Film Premier Passes Contest.(Added May 19, 2014 - We will have a feature film produced in the two states in the U.S. and the two countries outside the U.S. which have the most campaign dollars contributed to the campaign. This will bring jobs, economic stimulus, and positive international exposure to these four venue locations) (Added June 29, 2014 - The Top 20 Persons that bring contribution dollars to this campaign via their referral down line as tracked by Indiegogo will receive an all expenses paid FREE 5 Day Caribbean Cruise to Jamaica and the Grand Cayman Island in a Balcony Suite on either Royal Caribbean Cruise Lines or Carnival Cruise Lines. This is based on referral contribution dollars not personal contributions)(Added June 20, 2014 Anyone whose referral down line contributions  - not personal contributions- total $25,000 or $250,000 will get the same Perk benefits as if they had personally contributed that amount, i.e. Membership as Elite or Master Contributor Membership and all the benefits that entails)In this referral contest we are offering contestants the opportunity to win either an acting part in one of the feature films or a Pass for them and one guest of their choosing to attend an actual Red Carpet Film Premier with the film Stars. Here is how this works:  Your chances of winning increases the more you refer others to donate to this campaign.The top fifteen (15) referral based fundraisers will each receive a Thank you letter from Hollywood Producer, Jonathan D. Krane, personally addressed to them. Each of the top fifteen (15)  winners will also receive their choice of EITHER a GUARANTEED non speaking walk on part in one of the feature films in a scene with one of the "A" list film stars, plus a screen test directly with the film Producer and/or Director.  If they do well on the screen test they will be offered a larger acting part in the film OR if they don't want the acting part they can choose to receive two (2) Passes to the actual Red Carpet Film Premier with the film Stars (***Paid airfare and hotel expenses to film production set or film premier location included).Please note:* This contest is based on referral down line based contributions only. * In order for your referrals to be tracked by the Indiegogo referral tracking software you must be EITHER a contributor to this campaign OR have an Indiegogo account. This is very important.  If you are not a contributor to the campaign AND do not have an Indiegogo account your referrals will not be tracked and therefore cannot be tallied and used for this referral contest.  (See; "How to Share a Campaign" and "How to Run a Referral Contest" in the Indiegogo website for more details).* Your referrals contribution amount will be tallied SOLELY from your referrals down line as tracked from the Indiegogo sight referral tracker.  For those of you that choose to be contributors, when you contribute to this “World Transformation” campaign on any level the site will ask if you would like to share the campaign.  Click “Yes”.  You will be assigned your own personal link.  Your referrals contribution total will be calculated SOLELY from referrals contributions using your personally assigned link. Any other referrals method will not be counted.  So be sure you are using your personally assigned Indiegogo link to get your credits.  The Indiegogo referral tracker will not only track your direct referrals. It will track also your referrals referrals, and their referrals like a MLM (Multi Level Marketing) down line tracker.  You get credit for your entire referral down line contributions through infinite levels.For example:  You either have an Indiegogo account or you contribute to the campaign on any level, get your personal link, and share the campaign with others, making sure you are using your personal Indiegogo assigned link.  Lets say of all your referrals 20 persons contribute.  Those 20 people decide to join the contest, get their personal link, share the campaign, and those 20 people referring each bring in 20 contributors.  Then those 400 contributors each bring in 20 contributors.  Then those 8,000 contributors each bring in 20 contributors, and so on, down through infinity.  The total dollar amount contributed by this entire referral down line network is credited to you and you are ranked among all referring contributors by the TOTAL DOLLAR AMOUNT of your entire referral down line. The top 15 referrers as ranked by their referral down line TOTAL CONTRIBUTIONS DOLLAR AMOUNT to this campaign win.************************************************************************ALL CONTRIBUTIONS ARE 100% TAX DEDUCTIBLE!!!We know times are tough for many and we really do want to see everyone have the opportunity to directly benefit from this campaign. So for each $25 contribution we will send the contributor a specially designed "Wheel of Abundance".  This is a very powerful de-stressing visual tool believed by many to also create abundance in the areas of money, health, success, relationships, and happiness in one's life. For each $100 contribution you will get a Beautiful Full Color Glossy 24" x 36" Decorative Poster. You will also receive the "Wheel of Abundance". Plus as a $100 contributor you will also be put in a MOVIE FAN CLUB MEMBERS DATABASE.  From this database we will choose and offer Acting Parts in the films, Passes to the production set during filming, Film Premier Tickets, and Movie Memorabilia items personally autographed by the "film stars themselves".The Producer has agreed to give several acting opportunities per film to up and coming acting talent in each film x 20 films. When the producer starts to cast roles for the films, we will be requesting information and photos from contributors interested in the various opportunities described below which we will give to contributors.  All of the films will be rated PG or PG-13 and will be positive life affirming stories. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~YES, THERE IS MORE!!!All contributors to this campaign, regardless of contribution level, will be listed in the Directory of Founding Members of this Non Profit Foundation. $1,500 contributors receive a Hollywood Poster, the "Wheel of Abundance", all the benefits of the MOVIE FAN CLUB MEMBERS DATABASE, plus you will be put in a SPECIAL CONTRIBUTORS MEMBERS DATABASE.  Each film requires production contractors and vendors, (i.e. food catering, transportation, make-up artist, set design, photographers, etc...).  For each film, we will first choose from this SPECIAL CONTRIBUTORS MEMBERS DATABASE for qualified, competitive, competent contractors for these positions.Note: The difference between Fan Club Membership and Special Contributors Membership is that Fan Club Membership is for individuals wanting acting parts, music in the film soundtrack, etc. in the films. The Special Contributors Membership is for qualified businesses that wish to be contractors and vendors to the film project such as catering the meals for the cast and crew.$25,000 contributors will get all the previous perks, plus entry into an ELITE CONTRIBUTORS MEMBERS DATABASE.  These elite contributors will have access to the billions in for profit and non-profit funding created in this project model for their own QUALIFIED projects. By contributing at the $25,000 ELITE CONTRIBUTORS LEVEL, that becomes your skin in the game and it is 100% tax deductible. It is not that our funders don't require skin in the game. They do. But, for CONTRIBUTORS AT THE $25,000 ELITE MEMBER (OR ABOVE) LEVEL, AS A FOUNDING FOUNDATION MEMBER THE FOUNDATION, ONCE CAPITALIZED, WILL COVER 100% OF THE SKIN IN THE GAME (FRONT END COSTS/EQUITY) REQUIRED OF THE CLIENT BY TH E FUNDER FOR LARGE SCALE ($10 MM+) BUSINESS PROJECTS APPROVED BY OUR SOURCES AS PART OF THE FOR PROFIT/NON PROFIT COLLABORATION. IF YOU REALLY GET WHAT I JUST STATED, YOU KNOW THAT IS HUGE!!!  $250,000 contributors will get all the previous perks plus be put in our MASTER CONTRIBUTORS MEMBERS DATABASE.  Each MASTER CONTRIBUTOR will receive a VIP Invite for them and a guest to attend the Kick Off Party Gala Hollywood Gala at the Hollywood hills home of Producer, Jonathan D. Krane, You will be given the opportunity to receive (1) FREE product brand integration (not a mere product placement) in (1) of the feature films.  (Brand Product Integration must be structured satisfactory to the Producer and the Primary Film Funder). Corporations spend over $400 million dollars annually to buy these product brand integration spots in films and television.  This specific type of advertising in a feature film can easily cost millions of dollars. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~THE IMPACTThis project will effect the production and distribution of many good quality feature films, getting stories told and addressing social issues that might otherwise never receive film funding through more traditional funding.As the Foundation funds grow this will enable the funding of non film projects getting great products and services into the marketplace. This project will create a considerable number of jobs and stimulate the economy worldwide.This project will generate many millions of dollars for philanthropic and humanitarian causes.This project will give international exposure to life affirming humanitarian and philanthropic endeavors. My specially designed, "Wheel of Abundance" provided to contributors to this campaign will enable them to positively transform their lives in many ways including, but not limited to, the areas of health, money, success, and relationships.  The success of this campaign will allow us to give a special Thank you to Indiegogo for providing this fundraising platform by positioning our Non-Profit to contribute substantially to other Indiegogo campaigns.~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELPSome people just can’t contribute, we fully understand but you can still help.  We are all connected and getting these projects successfully implemented makes the world a better place in a substantial way.  So I ask that you please do the following:· Get the word out and MAKE SOME NOISE!· Use the Indiegogo share tools to help spread the word about this campaign.~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~DISCLAIMERS(1) All contributions to this campaign are non refundable.(2) Some of the contest awards and Perks in this Campaign will ONLY be provided, such as acting parts, film premier passes, etc.. upon the films being successfully produced.  (3) The Wheel of Abundance provided as a Perk in this campaign is being provided as a curious item and for it's legendary purposes only. No supernatural, magical, medical, or therapeutic claims are made for the Wheel of Abundance.(4) All material facts regarding this campaign, and the contest included in this campaign, are included in this Indiegogo campaign presentation material.  This Indiegogo campaign presentation material is the ONLY authorized and accurate information to be relied upon in your decisions to join the campaign and/or the campaign contest herein.  Any representations to the contrary are false, unauthorized, and are NOT to be relied upon.

story:
MY7LIVES IN PRESS

 


THE PROJECT


My7Lives is a fantastic opportunity for travelers who seek authentic Experiences and for locals to show them a slice of their lives! There are countless people around the world who possess skills and local knowledge that are interesting and valuable to travelers. M7L is a web platform that connects these travelers to locals, turning the locals into Experience vendors and any curious and adventurous traveler into a customer. M7L promotes Experiences with a capital "E"! That means we want travelers to not only experience travel, but to Experience life as a local with a local. Experiences could be surfing safaris on the remote West Australian coasts, a bike tour in the French Alps, trekking in the Sierra Nevada Mountains, wine making classes offered by a traditional wine maker in Burgundy, or a tour of the hottest locations during Design Week in Milan.

Connecting people directly to each other, M7L allows the unlimited potential of a local community and its traditions to grow into a micro shared economy. Under this economic model, M7L helps a local economy to grow, respecting and encouraging the local traditions, and utilizing available resources - it's locals! With M7L, all the economic resources brought by travelers to an area will remain there, unlike with traditional tourist offerings (e.g. big bus tours), which leave local communities with only a small part of the money spent by travelers.

For both travelers and Experience vendors, it is free to register and become a member on M7L. Only when an Experience is completed is a small transaction fee applied - similar to other web services in the internet travel industry.


HOW IT WORKS

M7L is not only for those who are looking for something to learn, but also for those who have something to offer. If you would like to share your "lives" or Experiences with like-minded people, M7L gives you the opportunity to offer these Experiences without third-party mediation.

  • STEP 1:  Join the community as a buyer, seller, or both!

  • STEP 2:  As a buyer, peruse through the many exciting Experiences that are being offered. Start your journey and live your Experience! Buyers collect points with every new Experience lived and as points are earned, there is an opportunity to become a M7L ambassador. 

    As a seller, create a "New Experience", complete the form, and your offer goes live in the M7L community.

  • STEP 3:  Once the Experience ends, sellers will receive the buyer's payment (minus a 4% M7L administration fee). Both the buyers and sellers can rate the experience. 
  • STEP 4:  Share your Experience with everyone - with the community and on social media.


SUMMARY OPERATION

Fees

Are you a seller?

You can post your offers FREE OF CHARGE.

48 hours following the end of the Experinece, the amount paid by the buyer (less 4% administration fee) will be credited into your PayPal account or bank account.

For example: 

BOAT TRIP price: $25.00

  • 4% administration fee = $1.00
  • Amount credited to your account = $24.00

Are you a buyer?

Purchasing an Experience includes the Experience price plus a 10% administration fee.

For example:

BOAT TRIP price: $25.00

  • 10% administration fee = $2.50
  • Total cost = $27.50


Want to sell?

It takes just a few clicks.

  1. CLICK on “+ New experience”.
  2. COMPLETE the form using the "guided insertion".
  3. WAIT FOR CONFIRMATION. We will notify you when the Experience offer goes live.

Want to buy?

It takes just a few clicks.

  1. SEARCH for the Experience you like.
  2. CONTACT the seller to arrange specific details (i.e. time and place).
  3. BOOK the Experience (by booking you confirm the Experience and payment is required).


THE ORIGIN

Giovanni Dell'Acqua, avid enthusiast of travel and adventure, felt that he was missing something to make his trips around the world incredible! The concept of My7Lives was born. After traveling to Silicon Valley and networking with tech startups, Giovanni understood that it was time to create a business model that could provide like-minded travelers with authentic localized travel experiences. 

In October 2012, while looking for a partner to help him realize his idea, Giovanni met Gaetan Licci. Gaetan was an IT manager and he loved the idea immediately. After three days of grueling planning - with multicolor pens and post-its galore, a massive sketch board, and several plates of Giovanni's pasta - the idea became a project.

In February 2013, a beta prototype was created and a month later, My7Lives Ltd (M7L) was founded in London. Thanks to several testers sharing their user experiences and to insight from friends and relatives, the beta version was enhanced and ready to attract partners to further build out the team. In May 2013, Alfredo De Joannon joined the project bringing new financial resources, another investor, Michele Martinuzzi, and a change in the strategy, moving from a national kick-off to an international scale development with a focus on crowd funding. He also helped the company develop a sustainability philosophy that underscored the importance of developing a dedicated channel of services for non-profit organizations.

Thousands of lines of code and some servers in the cloud are now the core of My7Lives. M7L is a multilingual website, still not public, that permits beta users to sign up, manage their user profile, and add/buy Experiences. In order to improve the quality, we are using the best technology available to develop best practices and effective customer experiences. What's under the hood? On the website, we are using open source technologies:

  • Linux 
  • Mysql
  • Solr
  • Grails framework
  • Tomcat application server
  • Apache web-tier
  • Bootstrap template with jquery and backbone.js

While we have done a lot of work there are still a lot of features that have to be developed in order to create an optimal user experience.

Below is a list of what we have completed as well as our roadmap for what is planned for the future.


ROAD MAP





PERKS SUMMARY

In exchange, we are offering :


Your Perks Support Non-Profits

Libera Terra

Libera Terra (‘‘Freed Land’’) was created with the aim of converting formerly Mafia owned properties for socially beneficial uses. The mission of the Libera Terra project is to give dignity to territories with a strong mafia presence through the creation of autonomous and cooperative farms that are self-sufficient, stable, and that are able to create work places, thereby establishing a moral economic system based on legality, social justice and fair market practices (http://bottegaliberaterra.it/it/home/)


Your Perks Support Art

If you offer $400 or more you will help us support the arts.

You can choose a beautiful work of art from a selection of young artists. They will produce an original work of art especially designed for you. Check out their profiles!Domenico Aiello's Artwork

Dario Grasso's Artwork

Chiara Aime's Artwork

Paolo Palmieri's Artwork

Alessandro Grazi's Artwork

Massimiliano Licci's Artwork





COMMITMENT TO SOCIAL AND ENVIRONMENTAL RESPONSIBILITY
While My7Lives is dedicated to helping connect people to each other and to life experiences, we are also equally dedicated to social and environmental responsibilities as a corporation. 

We feel ethically bound to help ensure that our marketplace offers Experiences that are respectful of the dignity and human rights of local communities, its people, culture, and environment (including animals). Therefore, all Experiences will be subject to review to ensure they respect human rights, local traditions and cultures; promote local arts and craft rather than mass produced products; promote a shared micro-economy; and promote a sustainable and socially conscious lifestyle.

Furthermore, we will offer the opportunity to offset an Experience's carbon footprint. We are working on a tool that will help travelers to calculate their carbon footprint and how much it will cost to offset it. We will then connect them to a trusted organization that will execute the compensation.

story:
Get to Know Us --> From Students to Helpers

World hunger is a real issue facing thousands in our East Tennessee community. As students at the University of Tennessee, we developed a desire to give back to the community that does so much for us. The four of us have partnered with Second Harvest Food Bank to join the fight against hunger, and we hope that you will fight with us.

Second Harvest is the largest hunger-relief charity in our region, stretching across 18 counties. This food bank alone distributes over 16 million pounds of food and sustenance to partnering non-profit organizations in our area.  These include emergency shelters, soup kitchens, food pantries, and grade schools.

Second Harvest takes pride in feeding our community; we can only hope to recruit you in the fight to end East Tennessee hunger.

What We Need

As a group, we have adopted an Elementary School within our region as part of the Food for Kids campaign. Every dollar you donate goes directly to some of the most vulnerable children in our community – those who miss meals on a regular basis.  By donating only $1, you can provide that child with three meals.

Our group has collectively decided on three campaign goals:

1. Raise $1,000 (or more) to feed hungry, suffering children in our area.

2. Increase awareness in joining the fight against hunger.

3. Ultimately: Make a difference.

Your Contributions – Oh So Appreciated!

We have put together some thank you gifts (AKA perks) for those who join the fight and contribute. To the right you can find everything from a handwritten thank you letter to a University of Tennessee rally rag. We appreciate all of the support we receive during our campaign; this is our way of thanking you.

The Impact

By donating to this campaign, your money goes directly to the children. Food is filled in a backpack and discreetly given to the child every Friday for a year. This ensures that the students (and potential siblings at home) are given the food they need over the weekends to remain healthy. Reports have shown that Food for Kids has improved self-esteem, behavior, and concentration in these children.

Also, Food for Kids has recently been underfunded for the 2013-2014 school year. They have had to limit the number of children helped at each school to only the 50 neediest. That makes your donation even more special.

Other Ways to Join the Fight

We understand that not everyone can support us financially. All good wishes and support are much appreciated! You can also help by spreading the word about Second Harvest and Food for Kids specifically. For more information check us out on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Second.Harvest.ETN

Another way to join the fight is by volunteering your time. If this interests you, contact
Second Harvest at:  

136 Harvest Lane, Maryville, TN 37801 // (865) 521-0000

Second Harvest takes pride in feeding our community; we can only hope to recruit you in the fight to end East Tennessee hunger.

What We Need
As a group, we have adopted an Elementary School within our region as part of the Food for Kids campaign. Every dollar you donate goes directly to some of the most vulnerable children in our community – those who miss meals on a regular basis.  By donating only $1, you can provide that child with three meals.
Our group has collectively decided on three campaign goals:
1. Raise $1,000 (or more) to feed hungry, suffering children in our area.
2. Increase awareness in joining the fight against hunger.
3. Ultimately: Make a difference.
Your Contributions – Oh So Appreciated!
We have put together some thank you gifts (AKA perks) for those who join the fight and contribute. To the right you can find everything from a handwritten thank you letter to a University of Tennessee rally rag. We appreciate all of the support we receive during our campaign; this is our way of thanking you.
The Impact
By donating to this campaign, your money goes directly to the children. Food is filled in a backpack and discreetly given to the child every Friday for a year. This ensures that the students (and potential siblings at home) are given the food they need over the weekends to remain healthy. Reports have shown that Food for Kids has improved self-esteem, behavior, and concentration in these children. 

Also, Food for Kids has recently been underfunded for the 2013-2014 school year. They have had to limit the number of children helped at each school to only the 50 neediest. That makes your donation even more special. 
Other Ways to Join the Fight
We understand that not everyone can support us financially. All good wishes and support are much appreciated! You can also help by spreading the word about Second Harvest and Food for Kids specifically. For more information check us out on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Second.Harvest.ETN
Another way to join the fight is by volunteering your time. If this interests you, contactSecond Harvest at:  
136 Harvest Lane, Maryville, TN 37801 // (865) 521-0000

story:
Info

Sweet Amsterdam
www.sweetamsterdam.com
Twitter
Facebook

Meet the Owners

Jessanne and her husband Farhad are a young couple who have been living in Los Angeles for a few years now. There are many things they love about the beautiful city but if you asked them to name one thing it would be the great variety of delicious foods that LA offers. Like many people in Los Angeles they LOVE to eat out and try dishes from different countries. Their latest "addiction" has been exploring the food truck scene in LA. Jessanne and Farhad describe food trucks as an exciting new way of exploring traditional and innovative food with the convenience of fast service.

Last year the couple went to visit Amsterdam, where Farhad grew up and he introduced her to two famous local sweets called Stroop Waffles (pronounced "Strope" Waffles, which are caramel Waffles). And Poffertjes (pronounced "pufferchess"), which are warm fluffy mini pancakes topped with butter and powdered sugar.

                      Stroop Waffles                                                    Poffertjes    

Jessanne fell in love with these sweets and the couple decided to buy some for their friends and family in the US to try out. Everyone agreed that it tasted unlike anything they have ever had before and wanted to know where to get them. Unfortunately, fresh Stroop Waffles and Poffertjes are almost impossible to get in the US so the couple decided to do something about this.

Sweet Amsterdam Food Trailer

The couple want the people of Los Angeles to have access to authentic fresh Dutch Stroop Waffles and Poffertjes and the best way to do this is of course with a food trailer. By using a food trailer they can make fresh warm stroop waffles and poffertjes on the spot and be mobile at the same time. This means serving many neighborhoods while keeping costs and prices low.

Front

Back

It is surprising how something so delicious has not become mainstream in the US yet. Especially considering that Belgium waffles are popular throughout the country but Stroop waffles are almost completely unknown to Americans. The young couple has invested a lot of time and effort in learning the art of making Stroop Waffles and Poffertjes and put together an amazing menu.

Menu

(menu is subject to change)

While delicious by themselves, we will also offer a variety of toppings for your Stroop Waffles and Poffertjes. 

Below you'll see some items from the menu.

                         Half & Half                                          Strawberry Whipped
 
            Ice Cream Stroop Waffle Sandwich (Chocolate & Vanilla)

For more information please visit www.sweetamsterdam.com

Eating these delicious sweets by themselves is an amazing feast for your taste buds, but many people in Amsterdam like to combine it with a fresh cup of Dutch brewed coffee. That is why Sweet Amsterdam also wants to sell fresh coffee imported from Amsterdam so you can experience the amazing combination that until now can only be found in Amsterdam. 

What We Need & What You Get

In order to get this food trailer on the road we need YOUR help.

We are raising $35,000 which will cover all expenses related to following: 

  • Food Trailer                              
                                                         $20,000
  • Appliances                                
                                                         $  7,000
  • Trailer Design                          
                                                         $  5,000
  • Product (COGS)                      
                                                         $  2,000
  • Other related costs                   
                                                         $  1,000
    (marketing, food license etc)    ----------- +
    TOTAL                                        $35,000

The Sweet Amsterdam trailer can be on the road serving fresh Stroop Waffles, Poffertjes with Dutch brewed coffee throughout Los Angeles by summer this year. The ultimate goal eventually is to have multiple food trailers serving many neighborhoods at the same time.

We are very grateful to anyone who will help us reach our goal (whether you are giving $1 or $100) and we would like to show our gratitude by giving amazing perks to our contributors. For a full list of all the perks and how to qualify for them please see the dedicated section on the right. 

If we do not succeed raising the full $35,000 it does not mean we are giving up on this project. Every dime raised here will get us one step closer to launch and we will continue looking for funding until we have what we need.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you cannot contribute monetarily there are still other ways you can help with this project. You can always spread the word about Sweet Amsterdam to your friends and share the link to this project on your social media channels. 

We look forward to serving the people of Los Angeles fresh Stroop Waffles and Poffertjes as soon as this summer but in the mean time please visit our website, twitter and facebook accounts to stay on top of our progress.

story:
Beacon Brewing Co. 

Craig and Josh are two craft beer enthusiasts who are ready to share their knowledge and experience with the Kootenays.  

Craig has been brewing beer for a while now and has developed Beacon Brewing's beer recipes based on his passion for high quality craft beer.

While living on the East Coast, Josh developed a love for the growler system implemented by many  breweries there.  Allowing you to take home and enjoy delicious locally crafted beer while eliminating waste, growlers are an economical and environmentally sound choice.

Opening this nano brewery has become Craig and Josh's greatest passion. They are excited to bring a new and sustainable way to enjoy craft beer to the community they grew up in.  The goal is to become a stable, locally owned and operated business.  

Any and all donations made here will be crucial to the opening of the brewery and save two local guys from being unemployed!

What We Need & What You Get:

Beacon Brewing needs $5000 to start purchasing equipment, ingredients and merchandise. These are essential to the opening.  

The donation perks include:

  • Pint glasses and t-shirts
  • First run growlers
  • A seat on the tasting panel
  • Keg service for a (local) event of your choice
  • AN OFFICIAL BEACON BREWING KEGERATOR!

Other Ways You Can Help:

Even if you can't donate money it would still be greatly appreciated if you could help spread the word to anyone and everyone.  It's easy to do by using the share tools here on this Indiegogo page!

Thanks, 

Craig and Josh

story:
If You don't have a paypal account and want to contribute via credit card see how you can do that by clicking the link contribute with credit card

Are you sick of spilling you soda/beer ? 

Sick of leaving you can for a few minutes and losing all of the fizz and having to drink stale soda/beer?


Well cappy is the solution to all your problems! It's going to make your summer a lot more awesome. And you'll put a smile on all your friends faces.


It's pretty simple to use - just snap it on and it good to go. It's easy to remove and clean.


The perks are pretty straight forward(2$ are added for shipping) :

Early backer perk - 6 cappy caps for 4$ + 2$ for shipping

Perk 1 - 6 cappy caps for 6$ + 2$ for shipping

Perk 2 - 12 cappy caps for 10$ + 2$ for shipping

Perk 3 - 18 cappy caps for 16$ + 2$ for shipping

Perk 4 - 24 cappy caps for 21$ + 2$ for shipping

Perk 5 - 60 cappy caps for 48$ + 2$ for shipping


By backing me up and purchasing a perk you're helping me - a 13 year old boy get a new laptop so I can finish school and realize my dreams!

And you can buy them for 0.15$ less per cap on ebay if you want to. But those 15 cents will help me towards my dream.


And here's why you should contribute to this campaign - I actually made another campaign that I need to raise money for a new laptop(add link here) and this is the reason I started this cappy campaign. If you want to visit my other campaign you can click here or read the quote from my other campaign:

Who am I?
My name it Tedddy. I'm 13 years old and live in Bulgaria. I study at foreign language high school - I study English and German right now.
Basically what I need is a new laptop cause my current one is 5-6 years old and has fallen apart. It's hinges are rusted and broke the top. 
The problem is that I need my laptop in order to study at school and do my homework at home. But at it's current state I can't do either of them and It hinders my grades as a result. 
My parents don't have money for a laptop and neither do I.
The thing is in my country Bulgaria the average salary per month is 500$. So you can imagine it's not easy to buy a laptop.
I also like creating Android app games. And I've created a bunch(12 right now) but I can't upload them to the play store cause it costs some money. And I can't upload them to the app store case I don't have a macbook.
What I'll actually use that laptop for is :
- to study for school and do my homework
- launch the Android and Iphone app-games
- create my blog where I'll write about everything in a teenager's life
- write and ebook about parents - how to understand your teen
- I also have designs for a few cool inventions that I'll need some funding to realize
- I have and idea for a new social media website that can become super cool so it's be great if I had a better laptop so I can start working on it
- I actually want to start a charity campaign for children
BUT I can't do anything on my current laptop. It needs a water bottle just to keep the screen up.
I'll need 2000$ to buy a macbook pro so I can do all the things above and create app games for Iphone and Ipad.
And this will benefit you all:
- If you like free apps and cool games to play - I'm going to create and release free ones. And lots of them.
- if you are a teen or a parent of a teen you'll read my free articles and ebooks on how to understand you parents/kid so you have a better relationship
- some of the cool inventions I design and want to create will change your lives
- and you'll always know that you were personally responsible for making this happen!
Here is a list of the perks you're gonna get if you decide to contribute:
I really hope you can help me raise the money. Cause I don't know what else to do. Maybe sell a kidney if I have to..
 
How you can help me?
You can help a few different ways. 
- Contribute any amount you can and get some of the awesome perks.
 - this is the most important one: Help get more people to join the cause.
 -You can do that by tweeting about this campaign and insert a link to the campaign in your tweets(especially if you have lots of followers).
 -You can share this campaign on your facebook or a facebook fanpage. 
 - You can talk about this campaign on youtube or vimeo (if you have a channel) and put a link to them. 
 - You can tell your friends/coworkers to come check out this campaign .
 - You can write about this campaign on your blog/website in a post and leave a link to it. 
 - You can write about this campaign on forums and leave a link to it.
 - You can talk about this campaign  on all social media websites, you use and leave a link to it. 
-You can even create a Vine about it.
Basically helping me spread the word so I can fulfill my goal.
Thank you very much!


Check out my other campaign - 15 in 1 credit card multi-tool


(Thanks to my big brother for helping me create this campaign and videos/pictures)

story:
Why we are excited about this opportunity        and how it will enrich our community

Being invited to represent mid Missouri at Slow Food's Terra Madre and Salone del Gusto conference in Italy is a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity. We will meet, eat and engage with people from throughout the world who are passionate about and committed to sustainable agriculture, cultural preservation and food with integrity. All the delegates, from more than 100 countries, will be there to represent the very best of what their countries' food systems have to offer.

This is not only an honor for the three of us, but an opportunity for others to learn about mid Missouri through the connections we make and the lessons we share with fellow delegates. Upon return to Columbia, we'll be happy to pass along newly gained knowledge through community conversations and application of the best practices encountered.

Who are we?

The three delegates from Columbia are Lisa Griffith, Carrie Hargrove and Jacob Knerr. Each represents a spoke in the wheel of Columbia’s constantly evolving  Slow Food culture and sustainable agricultural scene.

Lisa Griffith (in grey shirt)

Lisa, who grew up on a diverse Pike County family farm, sought several careers before returning to her Missouri roots several years ago. Her work with non-profit organizations—particularly in her current position as outreach coordinator for the National Family Farm Coalition—has connected Lisa with many educators, activists, farmers/fishers and chefs. She is inspired by them to promote social justice and food sovereignty—the right of all peoples to determine their own resource, agricultural and food policies.

Carrie Hargrove (with shovel)

​Carrie helped to create and has worked for the Columbia Center for Urban Agriculture (CCUA) for five years. The CCUA is a non-profit organization that teaches people how to garden. As its farm manager, Carrie works with many volunteers to grow beautiful, chemical-free produce that is sent to the Annie Fischer Food Pantry and Columbia Farmers Market. Her goal in life is to inspire all Columbia residents to love gardening and backyard food production as much as she does.​

Jacob Knerr (middle)

Jacob is a Rock Bridge High School student with a serious culinary passion. Having grown up on farms in rural mid Missouri, Jacob knows that food connects us all, and that access to good, clean and fair food is important for everyone—a perspective he tries to share with his fellow students. He puts his passion into practice during culinary arts classes at the Columbia Area Career Center. He also works at The Wine Cellar & Bistro as a line chef and host.

What we're asking from you

Your support will help send three representatives from Columbia, Missouri, to the conference in Turin, Italy. In return, we'll share Columbia’s vibrant Slow Food culture with international audiences and bring back knowledge gathered from throughout the world.

Our conference admission, room and board, and transportation within Italy are provided. We need help covering the round-trip airfare costs between Columbia and Italy.

Once we return, we'll be eager to share our experiences with our community, neighbors, co-workers, friends and families. All contributors will be invited to a presentation of our travels upon our return, and each one will receive a thoughtful “thank you” gift that represents our experiences in Italy.

What is Slow Food?

Slow Food is a non-profit, grassroots membership organization that was founded in Italy in 1986 as a response to fast food and fast-food culture. It has grown into an international organization with more than 150,000 members in  150 countries. Slow Food strives to link the pleasures of the table with a commitment to protect the community, culture, knowledge and environment that make this pleasure possible.

Columbia has a very active Slow Food chapter called Slow Food Katy Trail,  founded in 2003. In addition, the city has a robust community of support for sustainable agriculture, good food and independent, local family farmers. It is a reflection of this dynamic culture that three Columbians have been invited to attend Slow Food International’s Terra Madre and Salone del Gusto conference.

We need help covering the round-trip airfare costs between Columbia and Italy.Once we return, we'll be eager to share our experiences with our community, neighbors, co-workers, friends and families. All contributors will be invited to a presentation of our travels upon our return, and each one will receive a thoughtful “thank you” gift that represents our experiences in Italy.   What is Slow Food? Slow Food is a non-profit, grassroots membership organization that was founded in Italy in 1986 as a response to fast food and fast-food culture. It has grown into an international organization with more than 150,000 members in  150 countries. Slow Food strives to link the pleasures of the table with a commitment to protect the 
community, culture, knowledge and environment that make this pleasure 
possible.Columbia has a very active Slow Food chapter called Slow Food Katy Trail,  founded in 2003. In addition, the city has a robust community of support for sustainable agriculture, good food and independent, local family farmers. It is a reflection of this dynamic culture that three Columbians have been invited to attend Slow Food International’s Terra Madre and Salone del Gusto conference.

story:
On April 27, 2011, a violent tornado struck the community of Tuscaloosa, Alabama, devastating many lives, homes, and local businesses. One of the local businesses destroyed was Katrina Rollins' hair salon. Katrina, who owned her salon for 25 years, was eager to continue running her salon but did not have the capital necessary rebuild her business. Despite trying to secure a loan, she was unable to get one, even from FEMA, until she came in contact with Forza Financial. With the help of a Forza Financial loan, Katrina was able to reopen her hair salon and is once again a small business owner. 

Forza Financial is a student-run microfinance organization located in Tuscaloosa, Alabama. Forza provides small business loans to entrepreneurs and small business owners at affordable rates. In addition to affordable capital, Forza provides education through programs such as business coaching and seminars. We believe that helping small businesses grow and improve is vital to strengthening our community. 

As an organization, we need your help to fund our mission and help form strong small business and communities. We need funding to grow our organization, help pay operating expenses, and be able to provide more small business loans. Even a five dollar donation will help impact the local community.

Learn more about Forza Financial at forzafinancial.com.

story:
Hey, as most of you know, I went to Cambodia in 2013 to teach the Children in Bakod village basic English. I was so inspired by the experience that I've decided to take part in another! This time I'm going to be heading to the Monduli District in Tanzania, for one month, in support of the Cwlwm-Monduli charity. It is a small charity, founded in 1985 and aims to help the local people with day to day living and small community projects. It would be lovely if you could donate a small amount of money towards this cause, the money won't simply be given to the people, it will be put towards sustainable projects such as the construction of girls dormitories in order to ensure their safety and building an irrigation system to guarantee clean, fresh water all year round! I will be teaching English out there so a small amount of money will go towards text books and school uniform.

In total I am aiming to raising £800. I will do this in a variety of ways, this is my first option however, I am also going to plan a sponsored event such as a swim or anything physical to raise even more money. I am running stands at Coventry University once a month to help out a little bit more. Everyone who is joining me in Tanzania, on this project, will aim to raise a similar amount so that we have enough to fund each of the small projects. The money we all raise together is going towards community projects as listed above. The majority of the money is going to be put towards constructing the girls dormitories, the rest will be distributed around by purchasing the materials for building a netball pitch, a volleyball pitch and a playground. We need to come up with plans for preserving the farmers banana crops without using electricity so that all which don't get sold aren't just thrown away. 

One of the schools we're visiting needs a new classroom so we hope we can raise enough money to fund that as this means it will be able to accommodate a greater number of pupils. All the projects are aimed to be sustainable, by providing fresh water, we will enable the locals to use this for farming and improve the areas health. If 4 people donate £20 each, there will be enough to provide school uniforms to one of the schools. If 20 people donate £10 each, you will all have raised enough money to build one netball pitch.

However, if we don't reach the goal we have aimed for we won't be able to help the Monduli district as much as we would have liked, we will be unable to have such a large impact meaning the local population may miss out on the irrigation system or a way of preserving the crops. Hopefully this won't happen!

I had great success with my fundraising when I went to Cambodia, I managed to raise a total of £600 so I've set the goal even higher. I saw the difference this money made and hope you can picture the happiness on the school children's faces when they experience a higher standard of living, we are able to impact 300 school children by completing the girls dormitory and a possible 1,000 by purchasing new textbooks.

This project is valuable to you and the world, many like this are taking place within the less developed countries and we are slowly making a difference. Please get the word out and let everyone know of my charity! You can use the Indiegogo share tools or just email the link to everyone you know.

Thank you for reading this, don't forget to donate!!
